summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

span.para: 若要提供在衍生類別中的設計階段動作清單功能表命令，您必須覆寫屬性，以傳回自訂物件的項目衍生自物件。如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱。

To provide commands for the action list menu at design time in a derived class, you must override the property to return a custom object with items derived from the object. For more information and a code sample, see .
